# frequency

**Instance Property**

The time frame for which the rule applies.

## Declaration

```swift
var frequency: INRecurrenceFrequency { get }
```

## Discussion

This property represents the time frame over which a date or time recurs. For example, applying a recurrence rule with the frequency of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRecurrenceFrequency/daily] to date components containing the hour of 7:00 would let you create a trigger that applies at 7:00 each day.

Use the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRecurrenceRule/interval] property to create gaps in the repetition of the specified date.

## Getting the Rule Conditions

- **INRecurrenceFrequency**: The time frame for which the rule applies.
- **interval**: The interval at which the recurrence rule is applied.
